Dear Sir/Madam
Thank you for submitting a referral for {!Account.Client_Name__c} {!Account.Client_Surname__c} for Making Connections’ Good Food Delivered meal delivery service. The Client Information Leaflet for clients/ nok can be shared via this link: https://makingconnections.ie/good-food-delivered-client-info
If any of your clients require support, we are currently accepting referrals; Good Food Delivered: https://makingconnections.ie/good-food-delivered-referrals Befriending & Supports: https://makingconnections.ie/referral-pack/
I will be in touch again once this referral has been processed.
Kind Regards Mary O’Donohue -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
